articles.title: Man blames job-loss stress for opening plane's door, causing panic on flight - Business Insider
articles.description: The South Korean Asiana Airlines Airbus A321 flight had 194 passengers on board, 48 of whom were school children.
articles.content:
A man who opened the door of a plane while it was in mid-air said he did so because he "wanted to get off quickly," according to the South Korean news agency Yonhap News Agency.
